attributes.action: Back The Publican's Make it the Minimum campaign and introduce a minimum price of 50p for every unit of alcohol sold. This will end cheap booze promotions in supermarkets and bring off-trade prices closer to the cost of alcohol in the pub - the home of responsible drinking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leading trade magazine The Publican is calling for a minimum price on alcohol to bring an end to irresponsible bargain booze deals. Legislation is the only way to bring an end to these, often loss-leading, offers which are damaging to both society and the great British pub.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to back The Publican's Make it the Minimum campaign and introduce a minimum price of 50p for every unit of alcohol sold. This will end cheap booze promotions in supermarkets and bring off-trade prices closer to the cost of alcohol in the pub - the home of responsible drinking.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=makeittheminimum


Her Majesty's Government
